channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 'Take Back the States': The Far-Right Sheriffs Ready to Disrupt the Election
item.description: Constitutional Sheriffs are duly elected lawmen who believe they answer only to god. They've spent the last six months preparing to stop a "stolen" el...

item.title: Vinted hits $5.4B valuation amid wave of secondary share sales in Europe
item.description: Lithuania’s Vinted has secured a new valuation of €5 billion (around $5.4 billion at current exchange rates), after the second-hand fashion marketplac...

item.title: Google, Microsoft, and Perplexity Are Promoting Scientific Racism in Search Results
item.description: The web’s biggest AI-powered search engines are featuring the widely debunked idea that white people are genetically superior to other races.

item.title: Meet ZachXBT, the Masked Vigilante Tracking Down Billions in Crypto Scams and Thefts
item.description: He just untangled a $243 million bitcoin theft, what may be the biggest-ever crypto heist to target a single victim. And he has never shown his face.

item.title: LinkedIn fined $356 million in EU for tracking ads privacy breaches
item.description: Bad news for LinkedIn in Europe where the Microsoft-owned social network has been reprimanded and fined €310 million for privacy violations related to...

item.title: Judges and Border Police Targeted by Anti-Government Extremists, Doxed as ‘Traitors’

item.title: Perplexity launches a native Mac app
item.description: AI-focused search startup Perplexity launched its native Mac app today to compete with other AI apps like OpenAI’s ChatGPT and Quora’s Poe app — the l...

item.title: Intel’s $1.45 billion EU antitrust fine is officially history
item.description: A €1.06 billion EU antitrust penalty on chipmaker Intel for abuse of dominance dating back to 2009 (when it was equivalent to $1.45 billion) has been ...

item.title: This App Set Out to Fight Pesticides. After VCs Stepped In, Now It Helps Sell Them
item.description: Plantix started with the mission of making farming more environmentally friendly. So how did it end up selling the very products it wanted to fight ag...

item.title: Spotify adds auto-moderation tool to help podcasters manage comments
